notes.title: Funding
notes.p: This work was funded by the Alberta Mennega Stichting, Naturalis Biodiversity Center, and by the European Research Council (ERC) Horizon 2020 Research and Innovation Programme Project BRASILIAE: Indigenous Knowledge in the Making of Science: Historia Naturalis Brasiliae (1648) (Agreement No. 715423). None of these funds had involvement in the collection, analysis, and interpretation of data, or on the publishing of the results.
